name: DooHickey (Nomron)
description:
Made in 3 days for the Wowie Game Jam 4.0, this side-scrolling shooter has you operate every bell & whistle on your finnicky mechanical arm/gun. Had a lot of fun making it, even though I didn't get nearly as much done as I was hoping. 

Everything made by me except for some sound effects, which can be found here.
